text:
@SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Trump on COVID19
Called it a hoax
Blamed Obama
Muzzled the experts
Announced it "contained"
Told the sick to go to work
Released 2500 coronavirus kits
Had a hunch that it wasn't that serious
It's not Covid19 that's the problem, it's this guy.
#TrumpVirus
 https://t.co/AVRZWtRymE
